title: Pixel 3a Not charging
content:
I have a Pixel 3a running the Android Beta 2. In no way can I get it to charge (using multiple cables), and the phone keeps giving me system notifications like "Analog audio device detected" or "Charging connected device via USB".

I have contacted Google support however they can not help me because my phone is on the beta program. They asked me to opt out from the program but I can not do that because my phone is at 34% charge and I can not install any updates with the charge level. I have also created an issue on the android beta issue tracker because the support team told me to do so. The issue is here: https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/161029771

Is there anything I can do? I am frustrated by Google's customer support or lack of it.
